thread.title: Kris Storrs
thread.title_full: Avas Flowers reviewed by Kris Storrs

author: Kris Storrs
title: Kris Storrs
text: You would expect any florist with an ounce of sense wouldn't leave flowers on a front porch in 35 degree weather. All I got when I complained was an apology and an email stating "we are committed to quality and service". For the $$ I spent, I expected better service. Do not order from this florist!!!!
